title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
April 16, 2019
On Tuesday, April 16, 2019, the President signed into law:H.R. 2030, the “Colorado River Drought Contingency Plan Authorization Act”, which directs the Secretary of the Interior to execute and carry out agreements concerning Colorado River Drought Contingency Management and Operations; andS. 725, which changes the address of the postal facility designated in honor of Captain Humayun Khan.
